text: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya yaṃ kho ayye ayyā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā upasaṅkamatāyyā kālena cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī ti
edit: So ce dūto taṃ veyyāvaccakaraṃ saññāpetvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya yaṃ kho ayye ayyā veyyāvaccakaraṃ niddisi saññatto so mayā upasaṅkamatāyyā kālena cīvarena taṃ acchādessatī ti

translations.transtext: If the messenger, having instructed the steward and going to the bhikkhunī, should say, "I have instructed the steward the lady indicated. May the lady go (to her) and she will clothe you with a robe in season,"
